meanings.definition: The state or condition of having a mesomorphic body type.
meanings.sent1: His mesomorphy made him naturally strong and athletic.
meanings.sent2: She admired his mesomorphy and dedication to fitness.
meanings.sent3: The superhero's secret power was his mesomorphy, giving him incredible strength.
meanings.sent4: In the world of giants, his mesomorphy made him a towering figure.
meanings.sent5: The mesomorphy of the ancient warriors was legendary, allowing them to conquer all foes.

meanings.definition: The quality or characteristic of being mesomorphic.
meanings.sent1: The mesomorphy of the bodybuilder was evident in his well-defined muscles.
meanings.sent2: Her mesomorphy gave her a competitive edge in sports.
meanings.sent3: The comedian joked about his lack of mesomorphy, claiming to be more of a 'couch potato'.
meanings.sent4: The mountain stood tall and proud, a symbol of mesomorphy in nature.
meanings.sent5: The painting captured the essence of mesomorphy, showcasing the beauty of strength and power.
